nodes.body: Introductory philosophical textbooks (bsdus grwa) is a genre of monastic texts summarizing many philosophical topics for use in the classroom. The etymology is that bsdus means “collected” in the sense of “condensed for beginners” and grwa means “class” or “school.” (David Germano – June 21, 2004) Resources: bsDus grwa Literature by Shunzo Onoda.
